name: Rock
description: A genre characterized by a strong rhythm and often associated with electric guitars.

subGenres.teaser: A subgenre blending rock with other musical styles.
A fast-paced, edgy variation of rock.

name: Pop
description: Popular music characterized by catchy melodies and simple lyrics.

subGenres.teaser: Pop music that emphasizes synthesizers and electronic beats.
A fusion of pop and electronic music.

name: Jazz
description: A genre that originated in African American communities with complex rhythms and improvisation.

subGenres.teaser: A relaxing and mellow subgenre of jazz.
A fast-paced, intricate style of jazz.

name: Hip Hop
description: A genre featuring rhythmic spoken lyrics and often socially conscious themes.

subGenres.teaser: A subgenre with heavy bass and hi-hat beats.
Hip hop focusing on social issues and meaningful lyrics.

name: Blues
description: Music characterized by its melancholy lyrics and 12-bar chord progressions.

subGenres.teaser: A raw and gritty style of blues from the Mississippi Delta.
A more electrified version of blues music.

name: Classical
description: A broad genre of complex, orchestral music rooted in Western traditions.

subGenres.teaser: An ornate style of classical music from the 1600s to 1700s.
Emotionally expressive music from the 19th century.

name: Folk
description: A genre rooted in traditional music often conveying cultural stories.

subGenres.teaser: Traditional folk music of the United States.
Folk music from Ireland, Scotland, and other Celtic nations.

name: Electronic
description: A genre made primarily with electronic equipment and synthesizers.

subGenres.teaser: A style of electronic music with repetitive beats and melodies.
A fast-paced, rhythm-driven subgenre of electronic music.

name: Metal
description: Heavy, loud music with aggressive guitar riffs and powerful vocals.

subGenres.teaser: The original form of metal with intense sound.
A fast, aggressive subgenre of metal.

name: R&B
description: Rhythm and blues music often focusing on soulful vocals and themes of love.

subGenres.teaser: Modern R&B with pop and hip-hop influences.
A deeply emotional and expressive style of R&B.
